head.title: KMKSTROY Industrial floors
head.meta_description: Installation of concrete, polymer self-leveling floors. Construction, facade, roofing and finishing works in Dnipro, Ukraine.

about.title: About us
about.subtitle-p2: On the construction market of Ukraine since 2015
about.description-p1: The company has a license with the class of responsibility CC2, CC3, and a permit to perform high-risk works.
about.description-p2: Our staff consists of highly qualified specialists with experience in the field of arrangement industrial concrete and polymer floors, as well as other types of construction works.
about.description-p3: The company has a material and technical base, the necessary equipment, tools, machines and mechanisms.

services.title: The main activities of the Company
services.li1: A full range of works on the installation of concrete floors
services.li2: Installation of polymer self-leveling floors (polyurethane, epoxy, polyurethane-cement)
services.li3: Implementation of construction-installation, facade, roofing and finishing works
